attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Sirs

I have no support for nor affiliation with nor sympathy for wrongdoers.  However Ronnie Biggs poses no threat to society.  His treatment is inconsistent wiht the mild and irresponsible treatment given out by the authorities to much more serious recent offenders.  His situation in relation to other cases is now a situation that represents no danger in contrast to other more dangerous individuals who are free and not arrested or caught and set free almost immediately.  Whether he avows remorse is immaterial.  Compassion can be unilateral and in this case should be so.  The current incarceration of Ronnie Biggs is not consistent with the publics wishes or common sense.

He should be freed forthwith.

Yours faithfully,

Nigel Lee.
Portquin, Weybourne Road, Farnham, Surrey, GU9 9HE.

rejection.details: As stated in our terms and conditions, we cannot accept petitions on individual legal cases. Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
